name: Factory Trouble
description:
Your goal is to place wheels on top of orange colored devices by colliding wheels with each other on top of these devices. The level will be complete when all devices are full with wheels.

You're a robot and you can push around a few devices to assist you with redirecting, speeding up and slowing down the wheels.

WASD or Arrow Keys To Move

There are 6 levels in total. You can get stuck in a level, so don't forget to reset if you do so.

Note: This is a 48h game jam game and there are some serious bugs within the game. If you encounter any funny behaviour, try resetting the level.

Good Luck.

Arhan Bakan: Programming, Game Design

Volkan Ongun: 3D (itch.io Profile)
